definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
Special Duties Unit, Hong Kong special police

pinyin: ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 ren4 wu5

sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截圖的右面顯示了一個任務表示的示例。

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用於石油勘探和工程任務，如模擬飛機的設計。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 內戰結束後，美國南北方的人民都面臨着艱鉅的任務。

sentences.english: Accessibly several different versions, oriented to different circle of tasks.
sentences.chinese: 通俗易懂的幾個不同版本，面向不同圈子的任務。

sentences.english: Economic construction is an overriding task of China.
sentences.chinese: 經濟建設是中國壓倒一切的中心任務。

sentences.english: Only humping yourself can you hope to finish your work in time.
sentences.chinese: 只有加把勁幹，你纔有希望按時完成任務。

sentences.english: The parameter values can also be derived from values in previous tasks in the workflow.
sentences.chinese: 這些參數值也可從工作流內之前的任務中獲得。

sentences.english: First, break up the main task into data- or functionally-independent subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，將主任務分解爲數據或功能獨立的子任務。

sentences.english: First, break up the main task into data- or functionally-independent subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，將主任務分解爲數據或功能獨立的子任務。

sentences.english: This leaves time in each task for the manual delivery of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 這爲每個任務留下了手工交付書面文檔的時間。
不執行加油任務的航程爲11，500英里。

sentences.english: Upon completion of room temperature after the mission From Hutong, by the elevator back to the eco-construction.
sentences.chinese: 在完成溫房任務後殺出衚衕，由電梯返回到生態建築。

sentences.english: In 1966 the situation reached crisis point and Utzon resigned from the project.
sentences.chinese: 1966年情況變得危急，伍松辭去了任務。

sentences.english: I am er, Jimmy Florcruz with CNN. Premier Wen, er, you have the biggest and toughest jobs in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，您的任務是世界上最艱鉅，也是最龐雜的。

sentences.english: It is a long and humble business.
sentences.chinese: 這是一項長期而卑下的任務。

definition: to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
